description:
Newly repainted & re-carpeted, this one bed unfurnished flat benefits from a large open plan kitchen & lounge, generous sized bedroom, and a separate toilet and shower room. This flat is conveniently located within walking distance of Lothian Road & The Edinburgh International Conference Centre and has fantastic transport routes throughout the city. Fountain Park is located within a five-minute walk of the flat and has a cinema; gym; casino; bowling; and an excellent range or restaurants, bars and pubs.

summary: Bright and spacious, 1 double room with 1 single bedroom/study unfurnished property located on the third floor in the popular area of Viewforth, within walking distance to Edinburgh City Centre.
customer: {'branchId': 153032, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/154k/153032/branch_rmchoice_logo_153032_0000.jpeg', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 7342', 'branchDisplayName': 'Umega Lettings, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'Umega Lettings', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/Umega-Lettings/Edinburgh-153032.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/154k/153032/branch_rmchoice_logo_153032_0000.jpeg'}
description:
Bright and spacious, 1 double room with 1 single bedroom/study unfurnished property located on the third floor in the popular area of Viewforth, within walking distance to Edinburgh City Centre.

This 3rd floor apartment consists of: 2 bedrooms (1 double and 1 single), living room, separate kitchen and a bathroom.

Pets Considered. No Smoking.
Available: 20/12/24
Council Tax Band: D

Please hit the Book Viewing button on our website where you can register for a viewing!

Description:
They say first impressions count and the hallway as you walk into the flat does not disappoint; spacious and bright, you instantly feel at home. On the left of the hallway is the lounge, you are met with beautiful decoration, full of character ceiling cornicing, and a fireplace as the centre piece of the room. The large window allows the light to flood in and cleverly tucked away behind the alcove is great storage, allowing you to hang all your favourite clothes, leaving more space in the bedroom! Moving back into the hall you have the single bedroom, this neutrally decorated room is bright and would also make for a great home office or study. Back into the hallway, you'll find the modern bathroom with a great sized shower, this space will be a breeze to keep clean. Next is the light, spacious double bedroom which is neutrally decorated and offers a quiet space to relax! Finally, you come to the brand new kitchen with breakfast bar. Finished to a high standard, it boasts great storage space and plenty room to cook up a storm or entertain friends. You are all set with all the appliances you could need including hob, oven, fridge freezer and dishwasher - Now that's a bonus! Truly lovely property in a wonderful location. Don't miss out.

Location:
Located in the highly desirable area of Viewforth, right next to the canal, this property benefits from fantastic amenities close by. Just a stones throw from the Union Canal, your Sunday afternoon strolls are taken care of - hop on the walkway and wander beside the water for a bit of peace and fresh air. Just a short few minutes walk and you'll find yourself at Fountainpark offering a great selection of restaurants and activities. This property enjoys a quiet setting and is only a couple of minutes walk from the main road in Brunstfield. You have frequent bus access to Edinburgh City Centre and many not-to-be-missed local shops, cafes, and restaurants, Montpeliers & Project Coffee to name a couple with Tesco just round the corner for those late night snacks. A bit of greenery you say? Brunstfield Links and The Meadows just down the road for a spot of lunch in the sun or a gentle jog with friends. Sainsbury's Local is here as well where you can stock up on dinner essentials. A lovely property in an ideal location - get in touch now!

We are ARLA Propertymark and Safe Agent accredited and are proud to be awarded UK's residential letting team of the Year and The Negotiator Awards Scottish Agent of the Year.

Our Letting Agent Registration Number is LARN1804004.
Photos are for illustrative purposes only. EPC rating: C. Landlord Registration Number: 1286779/230/01092. Letting Agent Registration Number: 1804004.

description:
REF: 1786L: MCLEOD STREET

 

Impressive, 1-bedroom flat located on McLeod Street in the renowned Gorgie area of the city.  The area has a wide variety of amenities available such as parks, shops & sports centres, and a ten-minute commute provides access to the likes of Fountainpark Entertainment Complex and the BT Murrayfield Stadium. There is also excellent transport links via bus around the city, and Haymarket Train Station is also close by. This flat would be ideal for a professional or a student looking for a well-maintained property within a popular area.

 

The 3rd floor property features open views to Edinburgh skyline (including the castle) is available FURNISHED and comprises:

~Beautiful, open-plan, lounge/kitchen area with breakfasting bar, laminate flooring and large, bright window

~Modern kitchen is well-equipped with selection of appliances, excellent storage and tiled splashback

~Bright and desirable double bedroom with extensive, built-in storage and carpeted flooring

~Contemporary shower room with luxurious three-piece suite including mains shower

~Entrance hallway with good storage and providing access to all rooms

~Free, on street parking

~Electric heating

~Double glazing

~Secure entry

~Sorry, no pets

~Total floor area = 38m²

~Council tax: band B

~EPC rating: C

~Landlord registration: 460110/230/25331

~LARN1806025

 

Available: 3rd January 2025

 

Rent: £950pcm

Deposit: £950

description:
Superbly presented UNFURNISHED new build two double bedroom third floor flat, forming part of the exciting new development at The Point, Corstorphine. AVAILABLE NOW

The property benefits from having a large bright and sunny open plan lounge with a modern fitted dining kitchen with fitted appliances, two very good-sized double bedrooms, master bedroom with ensuite bathroom with shower and a private terrace off the bedroom. Shower room with WC. Further benefits include, double glazing, gas central heating, ample storage and one allocated parking space. The property has been decorated to the highest of standards.

Located approximately three miles west of the city centre, highly desirable Corstorphine enjoys a vibrant small-town ambience with fantastic local amenities. Popular with city professionals and families alike, Corstorphine is exceptionally convenient for the city centre, and thanks to its position next to the Edinburgh greenbelt, residents of Corstorphine are never far from the scenic Scottish countryside. Bustling St John’s Road is lined with a blend of high-street shops and independent retailers, cafes, bistros, traditional pubs and eateries. These are supplemented by a 24-hour supermarket and other large retail outlets, including over 40 shops at the Gyle Shopping Centre nearby. For sport and fitness enthusiasts, Corstorphine offers no shortage of activities, including several team sports clubs and gyms, plus an abundance of outdoor pursuits such as walking, cycling and wildlife watching at Corstorphine Hill. The area is served by excellent local schools and is also well placed for a choice of independent schooling options.

Deposit : £2350
EPC Rating: B
Council Tax Band: E
Landlord Registration: 519035/230/27022
Additional costs: Council tax and water charge, Utilities, broadband, Garden Waste Bin from local authority at additional cost
Heating Type: Gas Central Heating
Property Floor: Third Floor
Utilities : Gas & Electricity British Gas
Broadband Type: Standard Available / Ultrafast Available *as obtained from Further information regarding broadband and phone signal can be obtained from the Ofcom broadband and mobile coverage checker - Broadband and mobile coverage checker - Ofcom

This central property offers a spacious, open-plan living area, two well sized double bedrooms, high end finished bathroom and large modern kitchen area. Alongside this, the property has an outdoor courtyard space at the rear.

Private courtyard

description:
REF: 2359L: MORVEN STREET

 

Spacious, 3 bedroom (not HMO) top floor flat located on Morven Street, in the Clermiston area of the City, near to Drum Brae South and Queensferry Road.  The location offers excellent transport links into the City Centre and the M8 and M9 motorways, City bypass and Queensferry Crossing are all within a fifteen-minute commute. The surrounding area is host to a number of amenities including nearby shops, takeaways and supermarkets. The Gyle Shopping Centre is a ten-minute drive and Cramond beach just a quick commute. Edinburgh Airport and the Gyle Railway Station are also easily accessible.

 

The top floor property is in excellent condition, available PART-FURNISHED and comprises:

~Large lounge with feature fireplace, wooden flooring & twin windows which are south facing and offer lots of natural light

~Spacious kitchen with selection of modern appliances and fantastic storage space

~Large, master double bedroom with feature wall décor, wooden flooring and built-in, sliding, mirrored wardrobes

~2x further good sized double bedrooms with feature wall décor and one with built in wardrobe

~Family bathroom with shower over bath

~Spacious hallway offering access to all rooms

~Unrestricted on street parking

~Shared drying green

~Double glazing

~Gas heating

~Pets considered

~Total floor area = 82m²

~Council tax: band B

~EPC rating: D

~Landlord registration: 911194/230/13081

~LARN1806025

summary: A bright and spacious top floor one-bedroom flat situated within a traditional tenement building in the heart of Dalry.
customer: {'branchId': 269471, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/270k/269471/branch_rmchoice_logo_269471_0000.jpeg', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 4902', 'branchDisplayName': 'ELC, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'ELC', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/ELC/Edinburgh-269471.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/270k/269471/branch_rmchoice_logo_269471_0000.jpeg'}
description:
A bright and spacious top floor one-bedroom flat situated within a traditional tenement building in the heart of Dalry.

The property boasts a welcoming entrance hallway providing access to all rooms, a bright and spacious living room, a modern kitchen equipped with a range of wall and base-mounted units, a generously sized double bedroom modern tiled bathroom.

Additional features include efficient gas central heating and double-glazed windows throughout.

Perfectly located near Haymarket Station and within walking distance of Edinburgh’s city centre and Fountain Park, Dalry is a highly sought-after residential area popular with professionals, students, and young families. The vibrant main street offers an array of amenities, including cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, and local services. For leisure, residents can enjoy the Dalry Swim Centre and the nearby Fountain Park complex, which features a cinema, gym, adventure golf, trampoline park, bowling alley, laser tag, and a variety of bars and dining options.

The area also benefits from excellent public transport links, with frequent buses, tram services, and rail connections via Haymarket Station. Quality schools, both state and independent, are available nearby, and Princes Street is just a 20-minute walk away, ensuring easy access to all the city has to offer.






EPC rating: D. Landlord Registration Number: Pending. Letting Agent Registration Number: 1808007.

summary: One bedroom, second floor property in the excellent area of Newington. This property is in an excellent location for Edinburgh University students.
customer: {'branchId': 86782, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/company/clogo_rmchoice_37337_0000.jpeg', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 2492', 'branchDisplayName': 'The Flat Company, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'The Flat Company', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/The-Flat-Company/Edinburgh-86782.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/company/clogo_rmchoice_37337_0000.jpeg'}
description:
Viewings booked exclusively online at

One double bedroom, fully furnished flat situated just off Nicolson Street, in the heart of Newington. The accommodation comprises of the hallway which leads through to the open plan kitchen/lounge, with the double bedroom. The bathroom is situated at the back of the property and featuring a shower. The property is heated by new electric heating.

Further benefits of the property include secure Entryphone access and on-street permit parking.

Newington is served by an excellent range of shops, services and restaurants. Within easy reach is more comprehensive shopping at Cameron Toll Shopping Centre with its Sainsbury’s superstore, as well as a number of other retail shops within a short car drive or bus journey away at Straiton Retail Park and Fort Kinnaird Retail Park. The area is well positioned for access to Edinburgh University, Queens Hall and National Library with recreational facilities on hand including the Royal Commonwealth Pool, the Festival Theatre and the Meadows and Holyrood Park, both within comfortable walking distance. A range of bus services run along both Minto Street and Dalkeith Road providing quick and easy access in to the City Centre and many surrounding areas. There is good road access to the city bypass with excellent connections to the motorway network heading east on the A1, and to the west to the Gyle Shopping Centre, the Forth Road Bridge, Edinburgh Airport and the central motorway network. Excellent schools in both the state and private sectors are easily accessible.

Council tax band C. EPC rating: E. Landlord Registration Number: 331807/230/06441. Letting Agent Registration Number: 1904038.

summary: Excellent two-bedroom apartment, overlooking beautifully manicured communal gardens within an exclusive residential development in Gorgie.
customer: {'branchId': 269471, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/270k/269471/branch_rmchoice_logo_269471_0000.jpeg', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 4902', 'branchDisplayName': 'ELC, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'ELC', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/ELC/Edinburgh-269471.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/270k/269471/branch_rmchoice_logo_269471_0000.jpeg'}
description:
Excellent two-bedroom apartment, overlooking beautifully manicured communal gardens within an exclusive residential development in Gorgie.

Entered through the well-maintained communal stair via a secure door entry system, the accommodation comprises: entrance hall leading to all rooms, bright and spacious lounge area, well-equipped kitchen featuring a range of base and wall mounted units, two generously-sized double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, en suite for the master bedroom, and modern main bathroom with three piece suite.

The property further benefits from private residents' parking, gas central heating and double glazing throughout.

Forming part of the ever popular Gorgie district of Edinburgh, the property is set just to the west of the city centre, making it easily accessible by foot, bike or bus. In addition to a great selection of local shops, supermarkets and amenities, it is also a short walk away from Harrison Park, Union Canal and Craiglockhart Woods, offering plenty of opportunities for outdoor leisure activities. The Fountain Park Leisure complex with its multi-screen cinema, Virgin Active gym, bars and restaurants is also nearby. This property is in an excellent location for commuters heading westwards to link with the city by-pass, central motorway network and the airport, whilst Haymarket railway station and tram network is also within easy reach. description:
REF: 0490L: CAUSEWAYSIDE

 

FLAT SHARE: DOUBLE BEDROOM for let within a superb, HMO property located in the very desirable Causewayside area.  It is within walking distance to both George Square and King's Buildings so would be ideal for students.  Princes Street, The Meadows, Bruntsfield and Lothian Road are all within reach and there are excellent bus links on offer around the City.  The local area offers a fantastic range of amenities including restaurants, boutiques and bars, and there is a Tesco Express just a few doors away.

 

The 3rd floor property has good storage and lots of natural light. It is available FURNISHED and comprises:

~Double bedroom with carpeted flooring, for let individually (x1 available)

~9x other bedrooms already tenanted (mixture of male and female)

~Bright lounge/kitchen with all appliances and breakfast bar

~3x tiled bathrooms with electric shower

~Entrance hallway providing access to all rooms

~Zone permit parking (Application and payment to Edinburgh City Council)

~Communal heating system

~Secure entry

~Sorry, no pets

~TV & WiFi included

~Bills included*

*providing reasonable usage

~HMO license for 11

~EPC rating: E

~Landlord registration: 01363/230/11400

~LARN1806025

 

Available: 2nd December 2024 (room 2)
 

Rent: £699pcm (room 2)

Deposit: £699

Couples 10% extra rental due to increases wear and tear

 

Please note the photographs shown within this advertisement may have been taken whilst a tenancy was active in the property and as a result you should not rely only on these as an accurate representation of furnishings and items included in the agreement. A full list of which items are included in the property is available upon request from our office, based on a previous tenancy. A viewing is therefore required in order to ensure you have an accurate understanding and knowledge of the condition and contents of the property.

 

Property Reference

0490L EDI CS

REF: 2441L: LOCHRIN TERRACE

 

Very attractive, 1 bedroom flat with box-room, located on Lochrin Terrace, in the heart of Tollcross.  The Meadows and Lothian Road are within very easy walking distance and there are excellent transport links on offer very nearby.  The local area also has a wide range of amenities to offer and the Fountainbridge complex, which boasts a variety of entertainment including bars, restaurants, a Megabowl and cinema screens, is just a few minutes' walk away.

 

The 2nd floor property is decorated in neutral tones throughout. It is available FURNISHED and comprises:

~Bright and attractive lounge with carpeted flooring, large window and small diner with seating

~Contemporary kitchen with selection of modern appliances, tiled splashback and good storage

~Large double bedroom with carpeted flooring, neutral décor and extensive storage

~Box-room ideal as study, child's room or additional storage space

~Stylish bathroom suite with mains shower over bath

~Entrance hallway providing access to all rooms

~Communal, rear garden

~Zone parking (paid to and obtained from C.E.C)

~Double glazing

~Gas heating

~Secure entry

~Sorry, no pets

~Total floor area = 46m²

~Council tax: band B

~EPC rating: C

~Landlord registration: 1127025/230/28101

The spacious lounge has a dining table, comfy sofas and flat screen television and the kitchen comes fully equipped with modern appliances. The flat also has a shared bathroom (but two toilets in the flat) and laundry facilities. There is also car parking and bike parking on enquiry for an annual fee. Located in the immediate vicinity of the Haymarket train and tram stop, Morrison Circus is only a short walk into the centre of town and Edinburghs West End, meaning youll never be far from its bohemian shops and much loved pubs and bars.The area also has great transport links to both the University of Edinburgh and Edinburgh Napier University. customer: {'branchId': 135443, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/brand/brand_rmchoice_logo_52175_0002.png', 'contactTelephone': '020 3834 7927', 'branchDisplayName': 'Student Cribs, London', 'branchName': 'London', 'brandTradingName': 'Student Cribs', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/Student-Cribs/London-135443.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/brand/brand_rmchoice_logo_52175_0002.png'}
description:
Morrison Circus is the ideal place to live for students in their 2nd, 3rd or final years of university. Each flat boasts four large bedrooms that come fully-furnished with a double bed, desk, chair and plenty of storage space as well as your own personal flat-screen TV. This spacious four-bedroom flat is perfect for a group of friends as it boasts great communal spaces such as a large kitchen finished with the all the latest appliances including a dishwasher and large fridge freezer. This leads onto stylish open-plan living area that comes complete with comfortable sofas, a dining table for shared meals and a large flat-screen TV making this a great social space to enjoy with your housemates and friends. Parking permits can also be applied for if you drive.
Morrison Circus is located in the highly sought-after Haymarket area of Edinburgh City Centre, a popular student hub as it is only a short distance from the centre of town and Edinburgh's West End, meaning you'll never be far from its bohemian shops and much-loved pubs and bars. Morrison Circus is conveniently located for students at all Edinburgh universities as it has excellent transport links. By public transport it only takes 35 minutes to University of Edinburgh, 20 minutes to Edinburgh Napier University and 25 minutes to Heriot Watt. Housing over 90 students, this property is social and vibrant with local and international students from different years and courses. Student Cribs Letting Agent Registration number: LARN2008016.

customer: {'branchId': 87745, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/company/clogo_rmchoice_31360_0000.png', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 1526', 'branchDisplayName': 'Ben Property, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'Ben Property', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/Ben-Property/Edinburgh-87745.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/company/clogo_rmchoice_31360_0000.png'}
description:
This exceptionally presented double upper, three double bedroom, B-listed property offers a wealth of period features combined seamlessly with modern additions. The property is offered on a fully-furnished basis and would suit a family or professional. PLEASE NOTE THIS PROPERTY IS NON HMO. Please note parking is by council permit.

The accommodation comprises a spacious hallway flooded with light from thoughtfully placed windows leading to a fully-equipped dining-kitchen with tiled flooring boasting garden views and dining space for four people. Further to this level there is a large and elegant living room overlooking both Dublin Street and Abercrombie Place delivering panoramic views north towards the Firth of Forth, three generous double bedrooms, master with en-suite bathroom, the second bedroom boasting a marble fireplace gives the option of an additional study or walk in wardrobe and a modern family bathroom with shower over bath. This property also benefits from a contemporary stair case leading to additional study space, or flexible fourth bedroom, flooded with natural light from two Skylights, a large utility room and gas central heating.

The property, which stands on the corner of Dublin Street and Abercrombie Place, is superbly located on an exceptionally quiet (dead-end) street just five minute`s walk from Harvey Nichols, St Andrew`s Square and all the facilities of Princes Street. The nearby Waverly train station and tram networks are a short walk from the front door, as are a wide range of attractions to include John Lewis, the cinemas, gyms and restaurants of the Omni Centre; and the Playhouse Theatre while the renowned Old Town is but a ten-minute stroll away.

Ben Property Management Limited is a regulated agent, registration number LARN1809028

Landlord Registration- 871199/230/2****

EPC Rating: C.

summary: Beautiful 6th Floor, Meadows facing, two bedroom, 2 bathroom furnished property located in the desirable Quartermile. Lift access, 24-hour concierge service. **Available for 9 month let only, until end of August 2025**
customer: {'branchId': 153032, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/154k/153032/branch_rmchoice_logo_153032_0000.jpeg', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 7342', 'branchDisplayName': 'Umega Lettings, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'Umega Lettings', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/Umega-Lettings/Edinburgh-153032.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/154k/153032/branch_rmchoice_logo_153032_0000.jpeg'}
description:
Beautiful 6th Floor, Meadows facing, two bedroom, 2 bathroom furnished property located in the desirable Quartermile. Lift access, 24-hour concierge service. **Available for 9 month let only, until end of August 2025**

This stunning flat consists of 2 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and open plan living room and kitchen.

No Pets. No Smoking.
Available: 11/12/2024
Council Tax Band: G

Please hit the Book Viewing button on our website where you can register for a viewing!

Open the door to your fancy new home and you're greeted with a large entrance hallway. Leading from this you'll find the real heart and gem of this property: the large open plan lounge/dining area. With superb views over the Meadows (a rarity!), sitting and looking out over these views with a cup of tea is the ideal way to start any day! The modern kitchen has all the appliances you need, including large fridge/freezer, hob and dishwasher. Both double bedrooms have built in wardrobes, this flat isn't short of storage space for all your belongings! One bedroom benefits from an en-suite bathroom with shower over bath - relaxing soak in the evening sound right up your street? The second bathroom has a large walk-in shower, sink, toilet and storage.

The Quartermile development is one of Edinburgh's most desirable neighbourhoods, with residents benefiting from an impressive range of facilities. Right at your doorstep, enjoy a variety of cafés, restaurants, and shops, including a well-stocked Sainsbury’s Local, artisan bakery, and premium coffee spots. The area also includes convenient fitness facilities, such as the PureGym and the luxury Nuffield Health Gym with a pool, perfect for staying active. Proximity to the University of Edinburgh, Old Town, and Edinburgh’s main cultural landmarks offers residents a vibrant city life balanced with peaceful greenery at The Meadows, ideal for outdoor activities like jogging, cycling, or picnicking. With 24/7 security and concierge services, the Quartermile is the epitome of luxury urban living in the heart of Edinburgh.

We are ARLA Propertymark and Safe Agent accredited and are proud to be awarded UK's residential letting team of the Year and The Negotiator Awards Scottish Agent of the Year.

Our Letting Agent Registration Number is LARN1804004.
Photos are for illustrative purposes only. EPC rating: B. Letting Agent Registration Number: 1804004.

summary: Four double bedroom HMO property presented in immaculate condition including modern kitchen and bathroom. This top-floor bright flat sits in the heart of Canonmills ideal for students or professionals wanting the buzz of the city centre on their doorstep!
customer: {'branchId': 257648, 'brandPlusLogoURI': '/258k/257648/branch_rmchoice_logo_257648_0001.png', 'contactTelephone': '0131 381 4585', 'branchDisplayName': 'Northwood, Edinburgh', 'branchName': 'Edinburgh', 'brandTradingName': 'Northwood', 'branchLandingPageUrl': '/estate-agents/agent/Northwood/Edinburgh-257648.html', 'development': False, 'showReducedProperties': True, 'commercial': False, 'showOnMap': True, 'enhancedListing': False, 'developmentContent': None, 'buildToRent': False, 'buildToRentBenefits': [], 'brandPlusLogoUrl': 'https://media.rightmove.co.uk:443/258k/257648/branch_rmchoice_logo_257648_0001.png'}
description:
Four double bedroom HMO property presented in immaculate condition including modern kitchen and bathroom. This top-floor bright flat sits in the heart of Canonmills ideal for students or professionals wanting the buzz of the city centre on their doorstep!

Accommodation comprises:- large entrance hallway, brand new kitchen/ diner/ living room with breakfast bar, new shower room with walk-in shower, 4 double bedrooms each with a wardrobe and largest with desk. Property has gas central heating, secure entry phone access, a small shared garden to the rear of the property and on-street parking nearby available by permit through Edinburgh City Council.

Canonmills itself is a perfect location in the city centre. You are about 10 minutes' walk up to Broughton Street with all the bars, cafes and restaurants it has to offer and from there a few more minutes to Queen Street and George Street. You have both a Tesco and Lidl supermarkets round the corner and a Margiotta just up on Dundas Street 3 minutes away. For nature and green space, you are across the road from the Water of Leith and only a couple of minutes` walk to Royal Botanic Gardens and Inverleith Park. You`re also only a few minutes from scenic Stockbridge full of its restaurants, shops and the weekend market it holds. A property not to be missed!Council Tax: Band DEPC Rating: Band ELandlord Registration: 334608/230/14441
(Please note marketing pictures are from 2021 and the property has been subject to some changes) EPC rating: D. Landlord Registration Number: 334608/230/14441. Letting Agent Registration Number: 1807008.

description:
This spacious and well-appointed 3-bedroom furnished apartment at Western Harbour View offers comfortable, modern living in a desirable waterfront location (please note non-HMO)

This first floor apartment consists of: 3 bedrooms (all double - 3rd bedroom only as guest room or bed can be removed for study), Living room/dining kitchen, ensuite shower room and main bathroom

No pets. No Smoking.
Available: Now
Council Tax Band: F

Please hit the Book Viewing button on our website where you can register for a viewing!


The property features a large living room with a TV, L-shaped sofa, and ample natural light. Off the living area is an open-plan kitchen/dining area, fully equipped with a dishwasher, integrated oven and microwave, fridge/freezer, and generous storage space—ideal for both everyday living and entertaining.

The principal bedroom includes a separate dressing room that leads into an ensuite shower room, providing a luxurious private space. The apartment also includes a second double bedroom and a main bathroom with modern fittings.

The third bedroom, located just off the living room, is currently set up as a guest room. However, the bed can be removed to transform the space into a study or home office. Please note that this room is intended for occasional guest use only.

Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating, and secure underground car parking, ensuring year-round comfort and convenience.

Located in the picturesque Western Harbour area, the property offers scenic waterfront views and easy access to local amenities. Western Harbour is a peaceful, modern development that is just a short distance from the vibrant areas of Leith and Newhaven.

For public transport, the apartment is well-served by the Lothian Bus service, the number 11 regularly passing nearby, providing quick connections to Edinburgh city centre (around 20 minutes away), Leith, and beyond. The Tram is also serviced around 15 minutes walk away with connections out to the airport. The property is in close proximity to Ocean Terminal, where you’ll find shops, restaurants, a cinema, and a gym. There are also several local parks and recreational areas, as well as easy access to the Water of Leith Walkway.

Ideal for those seeking a modern living space with excellent transport links in a quiet yet convenient location.

We are ARLA Propertymark and Safe Agent accredited and are proud to be awarded UK's residential letting team of the Year and The Negotiator Awards Scottish Agent of the Year.
